name: Neuraliask

Neuraliask is an exciting visual novel game that takes you through a thrilling detective story. Focused on the theme of "Connections," Neuraliask challenges you to unravel a complex plot of a mysterious murder while immersing yourself in a world full of intriguing characters and hidden clues.

Using a unique image puzzle mechanic, you'll need to find the correct connections between the clues to progress the story and solve the mystery. As you progress, you'll meet a variety of characters, each with their own story and secrets. In Neuraliask, connections are the key to everything, from unraveling the plot to discovering hidden secrets. Are you ready to face the challenge and uncover the truth behind the murder?

Game made for the Ryan Laley Spring Jam! The theme of the Jam was "Connections".
Made by a team of 4,  this game was written and developed in 2 days. and is the first game and the first jam in which we participate!

We had to cut a lot of content including puzzles but we will try to finish the game soon! We had a lot of fun in this 2 days:D
